definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他買了本英漢字典，以便查找他不認識的單詞。

sentences.english: The name lookup services are not handled on this port.
sentences.chinese: 在該端口上不處理名稱查找服務。

sentences.english: Harry pulled his copy of Advanced Potion-Making out of his bag and looked up Felix Felicis.
sentences.chinese: 哈利從書包裏抽出《高級魔藥製作》，查找福靈劑。

sentences.english: Because the red-black tree is a binary tree, the time complexities of lookup operations are logarithmic.
sentences.chinese: 由於紅黑樹是二叉樹，查找操作的時間複雜度爲對數。

sentences.english: They are powerful for finding faults both in implementation and specifications.
sentences.chinese: 它們還可以有效的查找到執行與規範中的錯誤。

sentences.english: Where can you find out about train times?
sentences.chinese: 你能在哪裏查找火車時間？

sentences.english: Home later, in Amys Internet search assistance.
sentences.chinese: 回到家中之後，在艾米的上網查找協助下。

sentences.english: Each picture is marked with descriptive tags, making it easy to find what you’re looking for.
sentences.chinese: 每幅圖片都帶有描述標籤，便於你查找。

sentences.english: I can always add other finders by other properties later.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，總是可以通過其他屬性添加其他查找程序。

sentences.english: Finds the file text, giving its full path.
sentences.chinese: 查找文件text，並給出它的完全路徑。

sentences.english: I'll look up the number for you.
sentences.chinese: 你只能從電話號瑪簿中查找他的電話。

sentences.english: This slows down disk-seeking speed rather significantly.
sentences.chinese: 這會相當大地減慢磁盤查找速度。

sentences.english: In-memory hash tables are used for very fast insert and look-up operations.
sentences.chinese: 內存中散列表用於極快的插入和查找操作。

sentences.english: The designer framework calls this method when it's looking for a service implementation on a site.
sentences.chinese: 設計器框架在站點上查找服務實現時調用該方法。

sentences.english: But Hency was busy checking if there was somewhere easy for him to escape.
sentences.chinese: 但漢西也在忙着查找從哪裏能逃出去。

sentences.english: Find articles "and" products to "other" products, a leading low-carb.
sentences.chinese: 查找文章和產品名單其他頂尖低碳水化合物產品。

definition: to check/to inquire/to consult (a document etc)/inquiry/query
to search (a place)/to search (a database etc)
to consult/to refer to/to look sth up in a reference source
to look over/to examine/to check up/to ferret out
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
to obtain (information from an archive etc)
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to inspect/to run through a checklist/to take stock/to audit
